title: [Large-scale] Strategies for Enhancing Learning Engagement in Online Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Understanding of Online Educational Environments
context.additional_context: Pre-service/in-service teachers analyzing factors reducing online science learning engagement and developing improvement strategies using formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain how assessment activity types (formative assessment, feedback methods) affect learning engagement in online science education design.
Learners can design engagement-enhancing strategies using interactive elements (step-by-step interactivity, summary consolidation) in project-based activities.
Learners can apply methods to design personalized online learning experiences by measuring prior knowledge levels and confusion levels.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
